name: You're Not Alone (PixelShenanigans)
description:
The Brackeys game jam theme was "You're Not Alone".

My thinking began with "Lode Runner meets Alien", but I chose cute 1-bit graphics, so didn't manage to deliver a horror element.

A / D on keyboard, or joystick on gamepad to move.

Space key on keyboard, or A / South button on gamepad to jump.

ESC key on keyboard to pause.

Run in full screen! Gamepad works in game screens, but not with UI.
